TopicTitle: Need some help troubleshooting science stuff and mods

Articles.Content:
So I am having problems with some of my instruments, namely the thermometer, and the problem is that it doesn't seem to work outside of very specific situation anymore (the "default" results doesn't seem to trigger).

Here are the mods I have that modify ScienceDef.cfg:

Crowd Source Science-1.4.0 <-highly suspected of causing problem at first, however, problem persisted even after removal.

DMagic Orbital Science-0.9.1 <-only add a few more results on asteroid for stock tools.

Here are the mods I have that deal with science and have their own science added in, I don't think they are involved, but included for good measure:

ScanSat-v9rc41

StationScience-1.4

CactEye 2 Telescope - BETA 4

For a full list of mods I use:

The specific case where my science stuff doesn't work right now is in Mun high orbit. All of stock science instruments, and the aforementioned thermometer doesn't work here, while it should have, keep saying it can't be done right now.

Did some tests: Doesn't seem like it is due to the science def.cfg from crowdsourced science. Tried to modified it to include a specific situation for Mun high space and that still didn't work.

Edited January 11, 2015 by RainDreamer

*facepalm* apparently there was a stock bug related to this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106746-Contract-to-measure-temperature-cannot-be-done-right-now?highlight=Temperature+Scan

Gonna try again at different altitude
I had the same problem, but removing Crowd Source Science fixed it. Make sure you re-install DMagic Orbital Science after removing CSS. Other than that, it might simply be the bug you mentioned
